docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: With companies scrambling to cope with drug problems among their employees, a mini-industry of consulting and health-care concerns has sprouted up.

headline.main: BATTLING DRUG USE ON THE JOB

docs.snippet: LEAD: With companies scrambling to cope with drug problems among their employees, a mini-industry of consulting and health-care concerns has sprouted up.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: For two decades now, Dr. Claude W. Betty, son of a local farmer, has ministered almost single-handedly to the people of Perryton. He delivered the babies at all hours, took out the gall bladders, sewed up the victims of tractor and oil-rig mishaps.
